份document 重點:

Evolution Charger
This is the foundation of EVOLTO to create and explode the power itself.
To restore the body of EVOLTO, it is said that one must have the Hazard-Level of FIVE,
It is never possible for human being to be Level FIVE.

Another Driver will do?

EV-Lever
To generate the power of two EV-bottles and restore EVOLTO, this lever has to be rotated. It is closely connected to the charger, so it is even (佢似打少咗im)possible for human to rotate....

EV-bottle Slot
Two EV-bottle have to be set before restoring. However, one of them is found extremely broken, so a new EV-bottle with terrestrial materials has to be created.

其他都係話driver 用地外物質做,

quote.msg:
份document 重點:

Evolution Charger
This is the foundation of EVOLTO to create and explode the power itself.
To restore the body of EVOLTO, it is said that one must have the Hazard-Level of FIVE,
It is never possible for human being to be Level FIVE.

Another Driver will do?

EV-Lever
To generate the power of two EV-bottles and restore EVOLTO, this lever has to be rotated. It is closely connected to the charger, so it is even (佢似打少咗im)possible for human to rotate....

EV-bottle Slot
Two EV-bottle have to be set before restoring. However, one of them is found extremely broken, so a new EV-bottle with terrestrial materials has to be created.
